Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for the independent traveller”
Reviews.Author: Lillian-Melbourne
Reviews.Content: stayed five nights september 2010 booked wotif paid single arrival reception record booking manager extremely apologetic called hotels try eventually luck swapping upgraded double fifth floor clean bathroom modern clean hair dryer shower takes 7 minutes hot street noise insulated window closed quiet wall wall insulation terrible night hear using bathroom awoke times banging doors couple door due poor sound insulation woken mornings love negative hotel manager friendly helpful isnt lot tourist information isnt pass reception leave building dont feel convenient stop questions check pretty leave check independent traveller family arent information isnt ideal hotel versailles hard time building signage clue little name tag buzzer front door pros location 4 min bus termini station worth price mind discount booking wotif mentioned upgraded clean modern comfortable bed street noise air conditioning modern tv cable tv english channel fridge safe free unlimited fast wifi friendly staff elevator restaurants close metres taxi rank cons bad sound insulation breakfast lack tourist information
